posts.postText:
1) What position are you applying for:Mod
2) Your age: 13
3) Your location: CA,United States,PST 
4) Current In-Game Name: Chevy
5) Steam ID & Link to your Steam Community Profile: 1) What position are you applying for:1) What position are you applying for:STEAM_0:1:17110879,http://steamcommunity.com/id/xdustinx199
6) How did you find out about NNJG:I found it myself
7) How long have you been involved with NNJG and/or Shadow's servers:I played NNJG for like 3 or 4 months maybe more i think
8) What you can bring to the NNJG Team: i can be a map maker i made maps before i can start again,And I can make Weapons i have many ideas but yet never made it because no one needed it or they never told me they need a weapon (only for TTT)
9) Why do you want to be part of the NNJG Team:Because usually we encounter Hackers sometimes and theres only VIPS who can only Gag and etc And vip commands are down right now
10) Do you have any past experience with the position you're applying for:Yes i do 
11) Do you own a decent microphone, and do you frequently utilize it:I do own a decent microphone,i usally do frequently use it
12) Any other comments or information you can provide:Even though im 13 doesn't mean i am a Abuser i have Mod powers before and still do
